# <a name="delete-a-contact"></a><span data-ttu-id="c9f52-102">Brisanje kontakta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c9f52-102">Delete a contact</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="c9f52-103">U donjem levom uglu stranice programa Outlook na Webu, izaberite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c9f52-103">At the bottom left corner of the page in Outlook on the web, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="c9f52-104">**Ljudi**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c9f52-104">**People**.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="c9f52-105">Izaberite kontakt koji želite da izbrišete i izaberite stavku **Izbriši**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c9f52-105">Select the contact you want to delete and select **Delete**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c9f52-106">Ako ne možete da izaberete opciju " **Izbriši**", kontakt je možda iz Skype-a ili povezanog naloga društvenih mreža.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c9f52-106">If you can't select **Delete**, the contact might be from Skype or a connected social network account.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c9f52-107">Da biste izbrisali kontakt, idite na Skype ili nalog u kome se nalazi kontakt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c9f52-107">To delete the contact, go to Skype or the account where the contact is located.</span></span>
